vulnerability.name: USN-4217-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4217-1 fixed several vulnerabilities in Samba. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Andreas Oster discovered that the Samba DNS management server incorrectly  handled certain records. An authenticated attacker could possibly use this  issue to crash Samba, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2019-14861)   Isaac Boukris discovered that Samba did not enforce the Kerberos  DelegationNotAllowed feature restriction, contrary to expectations.  (CVE-2019-14870)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in Samba. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
